opinions.details: Originally the group was just called Quest. After meeting the Jungle Brothers, Afrika Baby Bam heard Q-Tip introduce himself on a demo track as being "from a group called Quest" and told him to say he was from "a tribe called Quest" and the name stuck.
台译很贴切了，就照着用。如果加注释的话可以说一下缘起：最早他们几个人取的乐团名只是一个单词quest。在制作【black is black】这首单曲时，前来造访的朋友提议在quest前面加上a tribe called，正好完美无缺。
